label: clinical_signal_03_dx_vaccine_immunogenicity_011
content:
## 2024-05-13 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 105
- Active: 101
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 19
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 4

### Enrollment by Dose Group
- Low Dose: 25
- Mid Dose: 26
- High Dose: 27
- Placebo: 27

### Immunogenicity By Group
- Low Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 74.5
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 6.0
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 16.8
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 4.0
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 108.0
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 10.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 180.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 15.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 131.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 11.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 32.4
- Mid Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 115.0
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 9.6
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 27.9
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 6.4
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 185.7
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 16.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 283.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 24.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 192.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 18.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 48.9
- High Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 162.4
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 13.2
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 38.4
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 8.8
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 250.2
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 22.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 392.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 33.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 263.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 24.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 60.6
- Placebo
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 10.1
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 1.2
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 2.9
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 0.8
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 29.8
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 2.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 35.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 3.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 31.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 2.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 8.4

### Injection Site Reactions
- Pain Percentage: 43.4
- Erythema Percentage: 21.1
- Swelling Percentage: 5.5
- Induration Percentage: 7.2
- Mean Pain Duration (Hours): 27.6

### Systemic Reactogenicity
- Fever Percentage: 22.3
- Fatigue Percentage: 32.0
- Myalgia Percentage: 23.1
- Headache Percentage: 23.9
- Chills Percentage: 8.7

### Safety Labs
- WBC (K) Mean: 8.7
- WBC (K) SD: 1.4
- Lymphocyte Percentage Mean: 34.2
- Lymphocyte Percentage SD: 7.6
- Neutrophil Percentage Mean: 63.8
- Neutrophil Percentage SD: 8.3
- Platelets (K) Mean: 245
- Platelets (K) SD: 42
- CRP (mg/L) Mean: 3.6
- CRP (mg/L) SD: 0.6
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) Mean: 13.1
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) SD: 1.1

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: VI-AE-1137, Description: injection site pain, Grade: 1, Relatedness: related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: high_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-1163, Description: malaise, Grade: 2, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: high_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-1182, Description: malaise, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: low_dose

### Events
- Site 04 monitoring visit, 0 minor findings
- DSMB safety review teleconference completed
- Vaccination day 6: 22 subjects received scheduled dose

### Notes
- Week 11: Immunogenicity assessments on schedule. 105 subjects enrolled across dose groups. Reactogenicity profiles consistent with prior weeks.
